title: Domestic teams with the most players at the 2018 World Cup
summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of players in the y axis.
Team Manchester City has the highest Number of players and Atlético Madrid has the lowest Number of players.
There is a difference of 7.0 between the maximum Team Manchester City and minimum Team Atlético Madrid.
